api_list.description: Access over 1 million [Platzi](https://platzi.com/) course reviews with ease. Never stop learning. Once you have your credentials, you can visit [Platzi Reviews Playground](https://platzi-reviews.up.railway.app/graphql) for a better user experience. Have fun!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://platzi-reviews1.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "platzi-reviews1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
